settings.subheading: Each piece is composed of soft geometries and enveloping weaves, giving shape to an intimate and effortless beauty.

settings.text: Whether you need a single, high-fidelity prototype or a full-scale production run, our team provides the one-stop solution for your most creative crochet designs.
settings.title: Where Craftsmanship Meets Scale

settings.description: Where the timeless aesthetic of crochet meets the consistency and performance of modern manufacturing.
A sentence or two introducing your brand, what you sell, and what makes your brand compelling to customers.
A sentence or two introducing your brand, what you sell, and what makes your brand compelling to customers.

Fominte's speed is unmatched. Their promise of a free, high-fidelity sample in just one week allowed us to make a quick decision and get our new collection to market ahead of the competition. The transition from the handcrafted prototype to the perfectly consistent machine-produced bulk order was seamless.
settings.title: Jessica Wu (Product Developer)

settings.description: Working with Fominte is a true creative partnership. They not only understood our vision for a modern crochet look but also suggested integrating towel embroidery to add a unique texture. Their ability to combine different crafts in one place makes them a one-stop solution for our most complex designs.
settings.title: Sofia Lorenzi (Founder of Resort Wear Label)

settings.description: For years, the inconsistency of handcrafted crochet was a major sourcing challenge. Fominte's 'machine + hand' model solves this problem completely, delivering bulk orders with 100% accuracy to the sample. Their turnkey private label service, which includes custom packaging and labels, has streamlined our entire production process.
settings.title: Alex Miller (Sourcing Manager)

settings.description: We were looking for a supplier who could translate the artisanal warmth of crochet into high-quality home decor. Fominte delivered perfectly. The texture and quality of their knit fabrics have been a fantastic addition to our collection of pillows and throws, and our customers love the cozy, handcrafted feel.
settings.title: Emily Carter（Head of Product）

settings.html:
Applications

Customization

Care Instructions

FAQ

Our Commitment

Your Partner in Product Development & Cost Strategy

Our customization service goes far beyond simply "making to order." We are dedicated to being the most valuable link in your product development chain, helping you achieve the perfect balance of design, cost, and market performance.

Fast & Free Sampling>

We understand the critical role samples play in your decision-making. That's why we promise: Free Samples (you only cover the shipping costs) and Rapid Turnaround (samples can be completed in as fast as one week). Whether you're testing a new design or evaluating our quality, we provide risk-free, high-efficiency support to help you move forward with confidence.

Strategic Cost Consulting>

Our value is measured by your commercial success. We take the time to understand your brand positioning and budget targets. If you are a mass-market vendor planning a design with high-cost elements, our experts will proactively offer constructive advice—such as suggesting alternative yarns or simplifying non-critical craft details—to help you create an attractive product with a stronger competitive price point.

Turnkey Private Label Solutions>

We provide a complete suite of branding services, delivering a finished product that is ready for your sales channels. This includes: custom main labels, care labels, and hangtags; custom packaging solutions; and support with product photography or video upon sample completion.

Preserve the Beauty with Proper Care

Due to its special open-weave construction, proper care is the secret to maintaining its soft texture and perfect shape over time. Please follow this guide to ensure your garment stays looking its best.

Washing Guide>

Best Choice: Gentle Hand Wash. Fill a basin with cold water (below 30°C / 86°F) and mild detergent. Submerge the garment, let it soak for 5-10 minutes, and gently press to clean. Never rub or wring. Rinse by pressing in clean, cold water.

Alternative: Gentle Machine Wash. Turn the garment inside out, place it in a mesh laundry bag, and select the 'Delicate' or 'Hand Wash' cycle with cold water and the lowest spin speed.

Drying Guide (CRITICAL)>

NEVER HANG TO DRY! The weight of the water will permanently stretch a wet knit garment.

Correct Method: Gently squeeze out excess water. Lay the garment flat on a clean towel, roll it up, and press to absorb more moisture. Then, reshape the damp garment and lay it flat on a mesh drying rack or clean surface, away from direct sunlight, to air dry completely.

Storage & Daily Care>

Fold, Don't Hang: Always fold your crochet garments and store them flat to prevent stretching. Prevent Snagging: Keep away from sharp objects like zippers or jewelry. Ironing: Use a handheld steamer on low heat. If using a flat iron, cover the garment with a cloth and use the lowest temperature setting.

Applications Across Your Collection

From sun-drenched beachwear to cozy layering pieces, our modern crochet technique offers versatile solutions for every part of your apparel and lifestyle brand.

Dresses & Skirts>

Create standout pieces with unique textures. Our crochet fabrics are perfect for crafting everything from elegant bohemian maxis and chic summer dresses to stylish co-ord skirt sets that capture a relaxed, sophisticated aesthetic.

Tops & Blouses>

Add a touch of handcrafted charm to your top collection. We produce a wide range of styles, including festival-ready crop tops, retro-inspired polos, and elegant blouses with delicate crochet paneling, suitable for both casual and contemporary lines.

Cardigans & Vests>

Our open-weave cardigans and vests are the perfect layering pieces. They provide lightweight warmth and a rich textural dimension to any outfit, making them a versatile and commercially strong addition to any seasonal collection.

Beachwear>

Crochet is synonymous with high-fashion resort wear. We specialize in producing sought-after beachwear items, including intricate bikinis, elegant monokinis, and stylish cover-ups that are essential for any vacation-themed collection.

Accessories & Home Decor>

Extend the crochet aesthetic beyond apparel. We create a range of lifestyle products, including fashionable handbags and totes, cozy decorative pillows and throws, and other bespoke items that add a touch of artisanal quality to your brand's offerings.

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I start a partnership with Fominte?>

It's simple! First, browse our collections. Second, contact us via email at Stephen@fominte.com or our contact form with your requirements. Our dedicated team will get back to you within 24 hours.

Will my custom design be kept confidential?>

Absolutely. We treat all custom projects with strict confidentiality. Your design is your intellectual property, and we will never disclose or sell your exclusive patterns to any third party.

Are your crochet garments actually hand-crocheted?>

Our garments are created using advanced computerized knitting technology to replicate the aesthetic of hand-crochet, ensuring consistency for commercial production. However, we incorporate meticulous manual work in the final finishing stages to achieve the highest quality.

What types of crochet products do you manufacture?>

Our product line is extensive: Fashion Apparel (dresses, tops, etc.), Home & Accessories (pillows, bags, etc.), and Crochet Fabric by the yard for designers.

What kind of yarns do you primarily use?>

Our selection is comprehensive, primarily using high-quality cotton, cotton-linen blends, recycled fibers, and other specialty yarns as specified by our clients, balancing aesthetic appeal with comfort.

What is your Minimum Order Quantity (MOQ)?>

For our crochet apparel and home goods, the MOQ is typically 100 pieces per style, per color. For fabric by the yard, a different MOQ applies. Please feel free to inquire for specifics.

How can I get samples?>

We are happy to provide samples. For our crochet product line, we generally offer free samples; you only need to cover the shipping cost. This allows you to evaluate our quality at zero risk before placing a bulk order.

Our Commitment

Our promise is woven into every fiber we produce. We are committed to delivering unparalleled quality, innovative design, and a partnership you can trust through measurable standards.

Commitment to Speed & Efficiency>

We understand that speed-to-market is critical for your success. Our streamlined process ensures your vision becomes a reality, fast.

Rapid Sampling: We pledge to deliver satisfactory custom samples for your approval within 7 working days.

Reliable Delivery: Once approved, we guarantee that standard bulk orders will be ready for shipment within 30 days. This predictability allows you to plan your collections with confidence.

Commitment to Responsive Service>

Clear and timely communication is the foundation of a great partnership. Our dedicated team is always accessible, ensuring your questions are answered and your project never loses momentum.

Online Inquiries: For messages received via our online chat during business hours, we commit to a response time of under 2 hours.

Email Correspondence: All email inquiries will receive a comprehensive reply within 24 hours.

Commitment to Quality & Partnership>

Beyond speed and service, our ultimate commitment is to the integrity of our product and the strength of our relationship. We stand behind every yard of fabric, ensuring it meets global standards and your highest expectations. We are more than a supplier; we are a dedicated partner in your success, committed to design confidentiality and ethical practices.

settings.text:
Tech Meets Tradition We deploy advanced embroidery technology to transform traditional hand-crochet into a highly efficient industrial language, making retro aesthetics scalable.

From Yarn to Ready-to-Wear Beyond fabric, we provide complete garment solutions. Our vertically integrated process ensures precision in every stitch, from raw material to final cut.

Tactile Excellence Our unique 3D hollow structures break flat limitations, delivering the warmth of handmade crafts with the durability required for modern wear.
